title: Council Decision of 16 March 1998 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 16 March 1998 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training (98/C 99/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training for the period 16 March 1998 to 15 March 2001:
A. >TABLE>
B. >TABLE>
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 March 1998.
For the Council
The President
J. CUNNINGHAM
